baseRule.text: 若比丘。與女人議共道行。乃至到一聚落。波夜提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 70

fullParallels.text: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjeyya antamaso gāmantarampi aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ. Tatthāyaṁ samayo, satthagamanīyo hoti maggo, sāsaṅkasammato, sappaṭibhayo, ayaṁ tattha samayo.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 27

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer sich mit einer Nonne verabredet und (mit ihr) dieselbe Landstraße entlang geht, wenn auch nur bis zum nächsten Dorf, außer zur richtigen Gelegenheit, muß dafür sühnen. Hier ist die richtige Gelegenheit: Der Weg kann nur mit einer Karawane bereist werden, (oder) ist als gefährlich und furchterregend bekannt. Dies ist hier die richtige Gelegenheit.

If a monk travels by appointment with a nun, even just to the next village, except on an appropriate occasion, he commits an offense entailing confession. This is the appropriate occasion: the road is considered risky and dangerous and should be traveled with a group.

Si un bhikkhu viaja con una bhikkhuni por mutuo acuerdo, incluso por la distancia que hay entre un pueblo y el siguiente, excepto en la ocasión apropiada: [La acción] ha de ser confesada La ocasión apropiada aquí, es esta: La carretera debe ser recorrida en caravana y es considerada dudosa y peligrosa. Esta es la ocasión apropiada aquí.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘與女人同道。行至一聚落。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 70

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻共女人同道行。更無男子。乃至一村間者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 70

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。與比丘尼先期共道行。從此聚落到彼聚落。除因緣。波逸提。因緣者。若多伴有疑畏處。是名因緣。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 28

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。與比丘尼期共道行。下至聚落間。除疑怖畏估客伴時。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 26

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！與婦女，共期同一道行，乃至一村間，波逸提。三十
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 30

translations.text: If a monk make an agreement with a woman to accompany her on the road in going to a village, it is Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu merencanakan perjalanan bersama seorang wanita, bahkan dari satu desa ke desa lain, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘與婦人。期同道行乃至聚落者。波逸提。三十
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 30

fullParallels.text: 若比丘與比丘尼計挍同道行除餘時。波逸提。餘時者。若多伴行有疑恐怖。此是餘時。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Kāśyapīya Bhikkhu Pācittiya 27
